about:
We are Lillian & Sjors. Together with our  13 year old son Max we live in our stylish renovated canal house on the river Amstel. 
We like to travel and during our holidays we make our house available for Airbnb guests.
Our favorite travel destination is Sóller, on the Mediterranean island Mallorca. Together with friends we own two houses there that are also available for your holiday. 
See Soller Secrets for more on that.
During the summer we usually go sailing on our J-42 Felice. The southwest coast of the UK is our favorite sailing destination.
school: Johannes Fontanus College, NHTV Breda, Utrecht University
work: at Zilt Magazine and Soller Secrets
